title: You guys are all Hilarious.
body:
This board is amazing.... I've read through about 15 posts at this point and time.. 100% every single one was genuinely toxic people trying to justify why they aren't toxic. 

MY FAVORITE PART OF ALL OF THESE?
Where they decide to blame Riot. Saying their system isn't efficient enough.

in 5 years playing this game I've received 0 bans. 0 chat restrictions. 
I talk shit every once in a while. But you guys are over the top. Spending 40 minute games flaming your team. theres an art to it that doesn't make you seem like a red faced 3 year old stomping your feet.

Guaranteed, none of you are perfect players. Get over yourselves. 
{{champion:26}} 
Chronoshift

replies.body: Though I do agree it's a bit silly these people flame than act innocent your post is a bit silly, pompous and pathetic.
I do take pride in being hilarious, but at least i try not to do it by being an unaware hypocrite, which indeed seems to be standard around here..

I dont know, i made a joke about a kid and his incurable rage over Ryzen being due to him having bought an i5 7500 recently, and he has spent the last two hours spamming me with "you will never suck dick you fat fuck ryzen is trash you cant play wildlands" in pms.

Humor leads to further humor, at least.
I'm with you on the never-punished bandwagon, but your post is a little... tasteless...

Well, think of it how you will, but having my teammates get discouraged because some brat feels they need to insult and berate a teammate for over 20 minutes seems tasteless to me. 

Everyone gets frustrated with a teammate it's normal, you can even make a comment when you see them do dumb things like "Don't worry (Insert champion here) No one was watching that" Or "You must have a huge IQ" Serve there purpose and they are short and sweet.

I understand your frustration, but this is just like kicking a guy when he's down. :(

######Not cool, man.
But I thought flaming people was okay, as long as I'm not the one who's initiating fights! Damn... Thanks for ruining my Saturday. What will I do now...
Nothing left but to rebuild i guess.
